review: Plugged it in - not detected! Tried every HDMI port on my Samsung HDTV, used the supplied power cord, tried with/without HDMI extension cord.. but it is not being detected. I tried my friend's TV (sony) and it is not being detected. My chromecast stick works fine on both the HDMI ports. I am planning to send it back. I am disappointed with it as I waited for a long time to get it and there is no troubleshooting information anywhere on the amazon website.

review: I ordered this in October at the amazon prime special price. We received the package in November but upon setting it up, found the stick was faulty. I spent a long time on the phone with two separate technical service reps troubleshooting the item, which would not make a connection to the television. We tried every single thing (and we're quite techy).  Finally CS decided it was faulty and I was to send it back, which I did. They received it. In December I received a replacement refurbished **remote** only -- no actual Fire TV stick. (Which was the faulty item in the first place.) I then called customer service again and was on the phone for an hour while they tried to issue a replacement. Instead, they are having me order another one and promising a refund on one of them with delivery now at the end of JANUARY. (I originally ordered in October, when they offered the special.) I've now spent many hours on the phone on hold and with CS and also made two trips to the UPS store and ordered the item (as directed by customer service) TWICE and paid for it TWICE and I have yet to receive a new working FIre TV Stick set, and probably won't receive it until 3 months after my initial order and I suspect it won't be new, either -- just a refurbished one. I love amazon and order all the time - however this really seems to be ridiculous incompetence.
